name: Eromsissel
description: There are no such thing as FUTILE EFFORTS! In this world, the POOR are RICHER than the RICHES. But NOT in money...? Defend your HEART by pushing aside CANCER-CLONES of yourself in order to continue adventuring through the game! Receive POWER-UPS to defend your HEART more efficiently! Your score is how much you GIVE to the homeless shelter/man on the screen. PS: EROMSISSEL is LESS IS MORE spelt BACKWARDS :D!
